title: A second defence of the New theory of the earth from the exceptions of Mr. John Keill. By William Whiston, M.A. vicar of Lowestoft, Suffolk; and chaplain to the Right Reverend Father in God, John Lord Bishop of Norwich
author: Whiston, William, 1667-1752.
publisher: printed for Benj. Tooke at the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleetstreet,
